entries.title: Breaking Down Neural Networks Like LEGOs
entries.description: Just like LEGOs, there are special building blocks for computers called Neural Networks that can help computers do cool things like see pictures and understand what people are saying.

entries.title: Building Smarter .NET Applications with ONNX ML Models
entries.description: This 4 part series will outline how to consume your pre-trained models (Trained using TensorFlow & PyTorch) in a .NET, Uno Platform built application

entries.title: Building an Image Classifier with a Single-Layer Neural Network in PyTorch
entries.description: A single layer neural network might not be ideal for every task, but it can be good as simple classifier and also can be helpful for you to understand the inner workings of the neural network and to be able to debug it.

entries.title: Exploring the Capabilities of the ChatGPT API: A Beginner’s Guide
entries.description: The API allows developers to easily integrate the power of GPT into their applications and create advanced language-based features, such as natural language understanding, text generation, and chatbot capabilities.

entries.title: How to get started coding for Arduino on macOS Ventura
entries.description: In a previous article, we looked at connecting various kinds of Arduino hardware to your Mac. Here's how to get started programming on them to create your own projects.

entries.title: JetBrains survey: developers 91% male, 73% experience burnout, more liking Rust and Go
entries.description: Yes on the first two, not convinced on the other two items

entries.title: Linux Foundation launches Open Metaverse Foundation
Meta's chief product officer says the metaverse will one day be as 'important as the smartphone'
entries.description: "On the back of his business card is gibberish explaining how he may be reached: a telephone number. A universal voice phone locator code. A P.O. box. His address on half a dozen electronic communications nets. And an address in the Metaverse."

entries.title: Microsoft investigates bug behind unresponsive Windows Start Menu
entries.description: Now renamed the Won't Start menu

entries.title: Microsoft to stop selling Windows 10 licenses by the end of January
entries.description: Soon it will only go to 11

entries.title: Report: Platform engineering to see big boost in 2023
entries.description: Once people get around to finding out what it is, maybe

entries.title: Styles of machine learning: Intro to neural networks
entries.description: Modeled on the human brain, neural networks are one of the most common styles of machine learning. Get started with the basic design and concepts of artificial neural networks.

entries.title: Two marines fooled a military AI using a classic Metal Gear Solid technique
entries.description: Lockheed Martin begins production of the M-300 Battle Box

entries.title: Visual Studio Spell Checker Preview now available
entries.description: You have nothing to lose but your suing delarcations
